shows.title: The Obama Dip
shows.desc:
When Michelle Obama came to London for her book tours, she asked Saima to make Booraniyeh Esfenaj every day, served with The Hampstead Kitchen’s oven-baked cumin pitta chips. Saima will be cooking ‘The Obama Dip’ live for all of us!

Saima Khan is the founder of The Hampstead Kitchen, an experiential private dining concept in which she curates unforgettable events that bring people together.

Supported by Amal – A Saïd Foundation Programme
